name: coffee-brewing-tracker
description: A web-based application for coffee enthusiasts to record, track, and manage their brewing recipes and outcomes

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared

author: Coffee Brewing Tracker Team
